channel.title: GWDS teles you without the kills

item.title: GWDS teles you without the kills
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Im not 100% on this because i havent dont delta in a while nor am i that good in general but try

if(objectId == 4755) && saraKills > 14) { for the first line

like what you do with a command thats for admins only. You should get the concept.

Read full topic
item.source: GWDS teles you without the kills

item.title: GWDS teles you without the kills
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

When you go down the cave, it teles you even if you don’t have 15 kills. Here is my coding. How do i make it to where it won’t let you tele unless you have the kills?

if(objectID == 4755){ if(saraKills > 14){ teleEffect = 1; sendQuest("Armadyl Boss - Kree'arra", 2482); sendQuest("Saradomin Boss - Commander Zilyana", 2483); sendQuest("Bandos Boss - General Graardor", 2484); sendQuest("Zamorak Boss - K'ril Tsutsaroth", 2485); sendFrame164(2480); saraKills -= 15; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); NpcDialogue = 150; } else sM("@red@You need at least 15 Saradomin kills to get in the cave."); }

Read full topic
item.source: GWDS teles you without the kills
